refnamediv.refpurpose: Fetches a row from the result set

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
result_id
A result identifier, returned by ovrimos_execute or ovrimos_exec.
how
Determines how the rows are fetched. This can be one of the following strings (case is not significant):
Option Notes
Next
Forward direction from current position. This is the default value.
Prev
Backward direction from current position.
First
Forward direction from the start.
Last
Backward direction from the end.
Absolute
Absolute position from the start. Requires rownumber.
rownumber
The row number, first one is 0. Only needed when how is set to Absolute.
